001package gbw.melange.common.elementary;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
004import gbw.melange.common.elementary.types.IElement;
005
006import java.util.Collection;
007
008/**
009 * <p>IElementRenderer interface.</p>
010 *
011 * @author GustavBW
012 * @version $Id: $Id
013 */
014public interface IElementRenderer {
015
016    /**
017     * <p>draw.</p>
018     *
019     * @param parentMatrix a {@link com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4} object
020     * @param elements a {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.types.IElement} object
021     */
022    void draw(Matrix4 parentMatrix, IElement<?>... elements);
023    /**
024     * <p>draw.</p>
025     *
026     * @param parentMatrix a {@link com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4} object
027     * @param elements a {@link java.util.Collection} object
028     */
029    void draw(Matrix4 parentMatrix, Collection<IElement<?>> elements);
030
031}
